intro: Henningia robusta, commonly known as the robust henningia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its upright growth habit and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. Its leaves are typically elliptical and have a smooth surface. Henningia robusta is often found in moist, shaded environments within tropical and subtropical regions.
